venue.name: Cohen Auditorium inside the Aidekman Arts Center

item.description:
The Harmony Sweepstakes A Cappella Festival is the premier American showcase for vocal harmony music. The annual national competition draws from hundreds of vocal groups from around the country with regional competitions in eight cities. The winning group from each regional concert is given an all expenses paid trip to California perform in front of celebrity judges and a sold out house of enthusiastic a cappella fans at the National Finals to compete for the national championship of a cappella.

The Bubs Foundation is proud to host the 21st annual Boston Regional this spring. The Bubs Foundation uses the proceeds from the Harmony Sweepstakes concert to fund its mission of supporting vocal music programs in Boston-area public schools. This support is rendered through grants to school music programs and its Be The Music® after-school music education programs.

The 2011 Boston Regional
  • Sunday, April 17 at 2:00 pm
  • Cohen Auditorium
  • Aidekman Arts Center
  • Tufts University
  • 40 Talbot Avenue, Medford, MA

NOTE: you must purchase your tickets in advance through Cohen Box Office for $20 617.627.3493:
item.why: Watch our own famous Beezlebubs a cappella group compete in the Boston Regional Harmony Sweepstakes
item.name: The Harmony Sweepstakes A Cappella Festival
